name: common-database
description: A  data aggregator to enable analytics

scripts.load_tms_config: cd ./config/scripts/tms/topology && node ./version.js && node ./networkSections.js && node ./geographicalAreas.js && node ./trams.js && node ./deploymentAreas.js && node ./trackAreas.js && node ./trackSections.js && node ./trackSectionDetectorPair.js && node ./conflictMonitors.js && node ./localControllers.js && node ./points.js && node ./signals.js && node ./chains.js && node ./detectors.js && node ./chainLinks.js && node ./spasZones.js && node ./massDetectors.js && node ./axleCounters.js && node ./stops.js && node ./platforms.js  && node ./lines.js && node ./routeSections.js && node ./routeSectionLinks.js  && node ./routeLinks.js && node ./routeLinkDetectors.js && node ./routeLinkAtStopDetectors.js && node ./routeLinkDepartDetectors.js && node ./routeLinkApproachDetectors.js && node ./routeLinkArriveDetectors.js && node ./physicalLoops.js
scripts.load_tms_timetable: cd ./config/scripts/tms/timetable && node ./operators.js && node ./garages.js && node ./stops.js && node ./routeSections.js && node ./routes.js && node ./journeyPatternSections.js && node ./services.js && node ./serviceJourneyPatterns.js && node ./vehicleJournies.js

author: Matt Cole
